com.africanbongo.clearskyes.util

Class LocationUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.africanbongo.clearskyes.util.WeatherLocationUtil

  • public final class LocationUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class used to perform operations involving WeatherLocation

    Can be used for :

    • Serializing and de-serializing WeatherLocation objects
    • Parsing a Location JSONObject from the API into a local WeatherLocation

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        public static java.lang.String serialize(@NonNull
                                         WeatherLocation weatherLocation)

        Split WeatherLocation object into a String.

        Where the WeatherLocation info is separated by tabs, i.e. "\t"

        Maybe used for storage or transmission

        Parameters:
        weatherLocation - WeatherLocation object to be serialized
        Returns:
        String of all the WeatherLocation String components

      • serializeAll

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> serializeAll(@NonNull
                                                           java.util.Collection<WeatherLocation> locations)

        Split Collection<WeatherLocation> into a Set<String>.

        Parameters:
        locations - Collection<WeatherLocation> to be serialized
        Returns:
        Set<String> containing all WeatherLocation objects info

      • deserialize

        public static WeatherLocation deserialize(@NonNull
                                          java.lang.String weatherLocationInfo)
        Deserializes a Set<String into a WeatherLocation object
        Parameters:
        weatherLocationInfo - String to be de-serialized
        Returns:
        null if not WeatherLocation info string provided, otherwise return WeatherLocation object

      • deserializeAll

        public static java.util.Collection<WeatherLocation> deserializeAll(@NonNull
                                                                   java.util.Set<java.lang.String> locationSet)
        Deserializes a Set<String> into WeatherLocation objects
        Parameters:
        locationSet - Set<String> to be de-serialized
        Returns:
        Collection<WeatherLocation>

      • parseIntoWeatherLocations

        public static WeatherLocation[] parseIntoWeatherLocations(org.json.JSONArray locationArray)
                                                   throws org.json.JSONException

        Parses a JSONArray into a WeatherLocation[]

        Credit to Takahiko Kawasaki's nv-i18n for getting 2 letter country codes
        Parameters:
        locationArray - JSONArray to be parsed
        Returns:
        WeatherLocation[]
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - if error occurred whilst parsing the JSONArray object
